name: Handsome Me with 100 Girlfriends!
description:
Official Community

Join our Discord channel：https://discord.gg/AgEPhfMJQN


HI, we are Philosophy♂!
This is a game that carries our dream of making a simple yet free world-based game.
You can just slip in and out of the world, either as a protagonist, or a passerby, and raid at will.

The protagonist is an ordinary teenager who is a squatter, but has extraordinary footwork skills, and works part-time to earn pocket money while living under the same roof as his aunt and sister.




● The map is free to explore, each building has its own function, home, foot massage parlor, hotel, convenience store

● Boost goodwill, take women from strange, to depraved, be a male porn star yourself, and all the girls can record AVs to share and make money
